6   
7   package org.fcrepo.kernel.api.cache;
8   
9   import java.net.URI;
10  import java.util.List;
11  import java.util.function.Supplier;
12  
13  import org.fcrepo.kernel.api.RdfStream;
14  import org.fcrepo.kernel.api.identifiers.FedoraId;
15  
16  /**
17   * Cache of user RDF types. This cache has two levels. Types are cached at the session level as well as globally.
18   * This is necessary to support long-running transactions that can span multiple requests.
19   *
20   * @author pwinckles
21   */
22  public interface UserTypesCache {
23  
24      /**
25       * Gets the user RDF types for the specified resource from the cache. First, the session's cache is checked.
26       * If the types were not found, then the global cache is checked. If not in either cache, then the rdfProvider
27       * is called to load the resource's RDF from which the types are parsed, cached, and returned.
28       *
29       * This method should NOT be called on binary resources.
30       *
31       * @param resourceId the id of the resource
32       * @param sessionId the id of the current session
33       * @param rdfProvider the provider that is called, if needed, to load the resource's rdf
34       * @return the resource's user RDF types
35       */
36      List<URI> getUserTypes(final FedoraId resourceId,
37                             final String sessionId,
38                             final Supplier<RdfStream> rdfProvider);
39  
40      /**
41       * Extracts the user RDF types from the RDF and caches them in the session level cache.
42       *
43       * @param resourceId the id of the resource
44       * @param rdf the resource's RDF
45       * @param sessionId the session to cache the types in
46       */
47      void cacheUserTypes(final FedoraId resourceId,
48                          final RdfStream rdf,
49                          final String sessionId);
50  
51      /**
52       * Caches the user RDF types in the session level cache.
53       *
54       * @param resourceId the id of the resource
55       * @param userTypes the resource's types
56       * @param sessionId the session to cache the types in
57       */
58      void cacheUserTypes(final FedoraId resourceId,
59                          final List<URI> userTypes,
60                          final String sessionId);
61  
62      /**
63       * Merges the session level cache into the global cache.
64       *
65       * @param sessionId the id of the session to merge
66       */
67      void mergeSessionCache(final String sessionId);
68  
69      /**
70       * Drops a session level cache without merging it into the global cache.
71       *
72       * @param sessionId the id of the session cache to drop
73       */
74      void dropSessionCache(final String sessionId);
75  
76  }
